title: Group-B Streptococcus
Aetiology: Commensal of the vagina and rectum, gram +ve coccus in chains, commenest cause of neonatal infection
RiskFactors: PPROM, intrapartum fever, Previous GBS, prematurity
Management: No prophylaxis unless there are risk facotrs, intrapartum abx ==> IV Benzylpenicillin
